posts.title: Universal Wall Socket Adapter
posts.content: Ensure you’ll be able to charge your electronic devices in virtually any country you visit using the universal wall socket adapter. This versatile device features everything you’ll need to safely power your gadgets while in a strange and foreign land.

posts.title: Laptop Desk
posts.content: Set up an impromptu workstation virtually anywhere in a matter of seconds using the slate laptop desk. The ergonomic design of this miniature desk is small enough to carry around yet provides enough room to comfortably work on your laptop.

posts.title: Build Your Own Skeleton Book
posts.content: Build your own skeleton while refreshing your memory on all of the bones in the body. This fun and interactive book includes everything you need to construct your very own and anatomically correct human skeleton – with labels included.

posts.title: Flat Folding Bicycle Helmet
posts.content: Now you can ride safe without having to lug around a bulky helmet by upgrading your riding gear with this flat folding bicycle helmet. The intrepid and functional design of the helmet allow you to easily fold it flat so that you can take it anywhere without the added bulk.

posts.title: Tower Fire Pit & Grill
posts.content: Stay toasty while you grill up your meals on cold nights using the Blaze tower fire pit and grill. It sports a functional pyramid-like tower design that can be used as a handy fire pit, charcoal grill, conventional oven, or pizza oven to cook up meals the entire family will love.

posts.title: Puffer Fish Dryer Buddies
posts.content: Help your clothes dry faster and more efficiently by tossing one of these puffer fish dryer buddies in with your load. They tumble in the dryer to lift and separate your clothes, allowing the air to flow more efficiently while also controlling static and softening fabrics.

posts.title: Lightshow Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker
posts.content: Give your nighttime dip a cool ambiance and bitchin’ soundtrack using this lightshow waterproof Bluetooth speaker. It comes with a built-in battery that can last for 12 hours on a single charge and features a cylindrical design that provides 360 degree sound and light.

posts.title: Birdcage LED Night Light
posts.content: Create a more pleasant sleeping environment for the little ones using this birdcage LED night light. The cute little bird sits calmly and quietly in his glass cage to provide a soothing and warm glow for your bundle of joy to slumber next to.

posts.title: The Dog Umbrella
posts.content: If you’re tired of walking your dog in the rain and returning home with your pupper soaking wet, then you need this dog umbrella. The dog umbrella is a see through umbrella that also works as a leash, keeping your dog in your control and out of the rain.

posts.title: Bacon Jams
posts.content: Just when you thought you experienced every way to clog your arteries – bacon jam hits the shelves. This sweet and salty treat is made with real bacon and comes in a variety pack that lets you try three distinct variations such as black pepper, red chili, and original.

posts.title: World’s Toughest & Fastest SD Card
posts.content: Dirt, water, and drops are no match for the TOUGH SF-G Series SD cards from Sony. It features a unique one-piece monolithic design that makes them 18 times stronger than traditional SD cards making them ideal for those who love action and adventure.

posts.title: Awkward Family Photos Book
posts.content: Bond with your siblings and parents through one of the many uneasy moments displayed by the Awkward Family Photos book. Based on the hilarious hit website, the book displays page after page of “unique” families immortalizing their awkwardness for the world to see.
